title: When was the last time you played a bot game?
body:
No seriously, when?

I almost forgot that mode exists, I even played Dominion.

replies.body: Just a few months ago bot games were all I did because I was learning. I should do a few more to explore some new characters without putting my whole team at risk.
lol you make it sound like you're gonna get your team killed xD
I did one yesterday because I was on a losing streak in normals and needed that first win of the day.

Gonna be playing bot games to learn Kalista. 

Is there a point to this thread?

This is random but mind if I join in on that?

I've yet to get used to supporting with one.
Yeah I asked a friend when the last time he played a bot game and he was like, mind blown. I think he too forgot that co-op vs AI exists due to all the other game modes lol.
Every game I play is a bot game, and I don't mean coop vs AI. In my last soloQ game all my team mates were bots.
To play with a friend who's fairly new, so he can learn without the pressure of being rekt by smurfs.

a couple weeks ago when a friend was learning how to play and i wanted to test out AD Vel'Koz. also, almost all of the time i played in season 3... i wanted to play at least 1 game as every champion and i'm almost at 123. just need to buy {{champion:83}} {{champion:78}}  since they aren't on free rotation
EDIT: pretty sure i'm close to 700 bot wins
I was actually just finishing up playing Coop Vs. AI mode :D
Every weekend because I play with several friends of different skill levels and bots is a no stress way to fuck around or learn.
